content: Credit Card Seedly Expenses Tracking Asked by AnonymousAsked 2w agoMay I ask how do I add my UOB Account in Seedly?Which function is it under?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Loh Tat Tian, 2nd Hand Insurance Broker / EX-FA at Singapore Insurance Value FindingLevel 6. MasterAnswered 2w agoIn the Seedly App, there is an "add account" which you can use. The bottom tab to use is "Accounts"At the top right hand, there is also a "Link Bank" which you can use by tapping on "UOB" and you will receive instruction to link the UOB account with your username and password.0 comments0
